title: allum paghalum
sahitya:
allum paghalum mun selvat-tiruvaDiyil amud-uNDirukka aruLAi paramporuLE


anupallavi

  shollukkaDangAda jyOti brahmAnanda svarUpa sAkSAtkAram aruLum gurunAthanE


caraNam    kANak-kANa unnaik-kavalai malai karaindu kadir mun paniyAgudE dInar 
mayakkam tIrkkum jnAna ciranjIviyE jIvan muktiyai vENDi dhyAnamalar tUviyE
